summary: CRITIQUE SESSION FIX VALIDÉ ✅ - Complete end-to-end testing of JPM NFC business cards platform after httpOnly cookies fix. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success). Frontend authentication session issue RESOLVED. All core functionality working including dashboard, profile management, public profiles, and mobile glassmorphism design.

minor_bugs.issue: Image upload field not accessible during testing - may be styling/selector issue
minor_bugs.impact: Users may have difficulty accessing image upload functionality
minor_bugs.symptoms: Upload field present in code but not easily accessible in UI

passed_tests: Backend JWT Authentication (login/register) - 100% success
Backend Protected Route /api/auth/me - Working perfectly
Backend Profile CRUD Operations - All operations functional
Backend Profile Filtering (all, expiring, archived) - All filters working
Backend Public Profile Access - Functional
Backend vCard Generation - Working correctly
Backend File Upload - Functional
Frontend Login Flow Complete - Session management FIXED
Dashboard Profile Loading - Now working perfectly (6 profiles loaded)
Dashboard Search Functionality - Working
Dashboard Filter Buttons (all, expiring, archived) - All functional
Profile Creation Flow - Complete workflow working
Profile Editing with Color Customization - Functional
Archive/Unarchive Profile Management - Working
WhatsApp Renewal Buttons - Present and functional on expiring profiles
Session Persistence After Page Refresh - Working correctly
Logout Functionality - Working properly
Public Profile Mobile-First Design - Beautiful glassmorphism implementation
Public Profile Interactive Buttons - Call, WhatsApp, Website, Maps, vCard all present
Public Profile Social Media Integration - Instagram, LinkedIn buttons working
Public Profile Custom Color Gradients - Working
Archived Profile Redirect to Service Suspendu - Working perfectly
Service Suspendu Page Design - Professional suspension notice
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor improvement: Verify image upload accessibility in profile form. The upload functionality exists but may need UI/UX improvements for better user access. Otherwise, platform is fully functional and production-ready.

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All APIs working perfectly with httpOnly cookies
success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All core functionality working, minor upload UI issue
success_percentage.integration: 95% - Excellent frontend-backend integration, session management fixed
